segments.text: I'd like to make an appointment with manager Mr.Wu . Would 10:00 a . m . tomorrow be all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid not . He has a meeting tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I possibly make it early in the afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that's not good either . But give me your phone number and I'll call you if somebody cancels .
segments.speaker: S2
